text: Buda was the historic capital of the Kingdom of Hungary and since 1873 has been the western part of the Hungarian capital Budapest, on the west side of the Danube. Popular landmarks include Buda Castle, the Citadella, and the president of Hungary's residence, Sándor Palace. == Gallery == File:Chiesa di Maria Maddalena.jpg|Mary Magdalene Church, Buda File:Orszaghaz utca.jpg|Országház utca (= Parliament Street) File:Piazza di Buda.jpg|Buda Main Plaza File:Ristorante Arany Hordo.jpg|Arany Hordó Inn File:Ristorante del Vecchio Parlamento.jpg|Old Parliament Inn File:Úri utca 58, 60, 62, Budapest.jpg|Tárnok utca (= Treasury Street)
title: Buda
